LanguageData.AddBulkUnfinishedThing_Tooltip: Allow partially completed items to be stored and resumed later\n(Restart required)
LanguageData.SameQuality_Tooltip: All the products of the recipe will have the same quality (Restart required)
LanguageData.LoadListDialog_Message: Your current list is not saved! If you load this list, you will lose the current one.\nAre you sure you want to load '{0}' list?\nWARNING: This action is irreversible!
LanguageData.DeleteListDialog_Message: Are you sure you want to delete '{0}' list?\nWARNING: This action is irreversible!
LanguageData.ResetDialog_Message: Are you sure you want to reset the list?\nWARNING: This action is irreversible!
LanguageData.Attention_Label: ATTENTION: If you add, modify or remove a recipe, it's recommended to restart the game.
